Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the Officer breach procedural fairness or misapply the hardship test under subsection 25(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act?
Crimes.Outcome: Application dismissed; no certification question granted
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of Officer's decision denying exemption under IRPA subsection 25(1)
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Humanitarian and compassionate considerations due to separation from family and community in Canada
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Insufficient evidence of unusual hardship; reasonable consideration of all factors
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to Officer’s discretion
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Humanitarian and compassionate grounds requiring unusual and undeserved or disproportionate hardship
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Breach of procedural fairness or misapplication of hardship test
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: No breach of procedural fairness or misapplication found
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Allegation of procedural unfairness and misapplication of hardship test
